bioghist.p: Villanova University President Edmund J. Dobbin announced in March 1990 the formation of a Steering Committee to begin the planning for Villanova’s Sesquicentennial observance. The 150th anniversary celebration was held during the school year 1992-1993. The committee was charged by Father Dobbin “with the responsibility for providing creative direction and leadership to several committees working on specific aspects of the celebration.” Father Dobbin appointed a Chair and 17-member committee. Subsequently the Sesquicentennial Committee formed 10 subcommittees to oversee events, activities and programs related to Villanova’s 150th anniversary in 1992-1993.

scopecontent.p: The Sesquicentennial collection includes correspondence related to planning, exhibitions, histories, and the Sesquicentennial Pictorial, as well as minutes of the Sesquicentennial Committee, Sesquicentennial Historical dates and Sesquicentennial Historical Minutes. Printed materials consist of publications generated during the Sesquicentennial and include a Belle Air Yearbook, Blue Book Sesquicentennial Exhibit Catalog, University Bulletins, and Villanova Magazine. The Programs series includes brochures and other materials related to various events during the sesquicentennial. Reports are varied and include Sesquicentennial Committee, Sesquicentennial History (Proposal), Sesquicentennial Steering Committee, Sesquicentennial History and others.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
